data.claim: Zep is a temporal knowledge graph memory platform achieving 80.32% accuracy at 189ms latency on LoCoMo benchmark. Key innovation: facts have temporal validity windows (valid_from, valid_until) enabling automatic fact invalidation when information changes.
data.snippet: 80.32% accuracy @ 189ms. Facts tracked with date ranges like: Emily is experiencing login issues (2024-11-14 - present)
